fields.title: Counter-Strike 2 Major Update Released
fields.summary: Valve introduces new maps and gameplay mechanics in the latest update.

fields.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Announces New DLC
fields.summary: Larian Studios reveals upcoming content expansion with new areas and companions.

fields.title: The Elder Scrolls VI Development Update
fields.summary: Bethesda shares new details about the highly anticipated next chapter in The Elder Scrolls series.

fields.title: GTA 6 Gameplay Features Revealed
fields.summary: Rockstar Games unveils new gameplay mechanics and features for the upcoming Grand Theft Auto VI.

fields.title: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth Launch Success
fields.summary: Square Enix celebrates record-breaking sales for the latest installment in the FF7 Remake project.

fields.title: New PlayStation 5 Pro Specifications Leaked
fields.summary: Details about Sony's upgraded PS5 Pro console emerge, promising significant performance improvements.
